questions.questionTitle: Who most likely are the speakers?
What problem does the man have?
anwers: He is late with a project.

questions.questionTitle: What does the woman offer to do?
anwers: Give the man the rest of the day off.
Finish the man's work for him.
Have a colleague help the man.
Take the man out for lunch.

script:
